str2: Neither, nor, not even, and not. From ou and de; not however, i.e. Neither, nor, not even.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: Probably a fuller form of rheo; an alternate for epo in certain tenses; to utter, i.e. Speak or say.

parse: Verb - Aorist Imperative Active - 2nd Person Singular
str2: See! Lo! Behold! Look! Second person singular imperative middle voice of eido; used as imperative lo!
From an adverb form of hode; in this same spot, i.e. Here or hither.
Or, than. A primary particle of distinction between two connected terms; disjunctive, or; comparative, than.
(a) there, yonder, in that place, (b) thither, there. Of uncertain affinity; there; by extension, thither.
For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.

parse: Verb - Aorist Imperative Active - 2nd Person Singular
str2: See! Lo! Behold! Look! Second person singular imperative middle voice of eido; used as imperative lo!
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From basileus; properly, royalty, i.e. rule, or a realm.
A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
Within, inside, the inside. From en; inside.
